Hold My Template App

Instructions

Hold My Template App allows one click copy of different Templates or text. You can hold text quickly in the small text boxes, and hold constantly used larger Templates in the large boxes.

Split Text will split the first textbox into two new results. It will split all words.

Title can be clicked and edited to what ever you would like to name them.

Click Delete and the red X to delete an entire template or split text (Clicking on any of the red X's in split test will delete all of the split results).

The templates automatically save locally to your browser when changed.

Finally, you can toggle the instructions by using the ? button.

Please enjoy, and Thank you for using Hold My Template App
